project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context and Objectives
sections.goal: Establish shared understanding of Orion Edge Gateway scope, phase, and key deliverables.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the primary business drivers for the Orion Edge Gateway?
Which customer problems are we aiming to solve in the Build phase?
How do the SLA requirements, such as p95 latency < 120ms, influence your backlog prioritization?

sections.title: Stakeholder Needs and Prioritization
sections.goal: Explore how the Product Owner balances technical constraints with customer requirements.
sample_questions: How do you capture and reconcile differing stakeholder requirements for API rate limiting?
What tradeoffs have you faced between security integration and delivery timelines?
How do you ensure alignment with Novereon Systems' values like 'Safety First'?

sections.title: Integration and Cross-Team Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand multi-hop links between Orion Edge Gateway and other subsystems in the portfolio.
sample_questions: Can you describe dependencies Orion has on Aegis IAM for auth integration?
How do you coordinate deployment windows with Poseidon Networking for mTLS policy changes?
What risks arise from coupling to Helios Datalake for certain API endpoints?

sections.title: Risk Management and Evidence-Based Decisions
sections.goal: Assess how decisions are made under uncertainty, using evidence and runbooks.
sample_questions: Can you give an example where you used a runbook like RB-GW-011 to mitigate deployment risk?
How do you decide when to escalate an incident vs. handle within the team?
What metrics or logs do you review post-release to validate success criteria?

sections.title: Future Planning and Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Identify upcoming challenges, scalability requirements, and improvement initiatives.
sample_questions: What scalability challenges do you foresee as traffic grows?
How will you evolve rate limiting strategies to support new products?
What lessons from the Build phase will you carry into Operate?
